creditline: Gift of Daniel Greenberg and Susan Steinhauser

medium: Archival pigment print on Epson Ultra Smooth Fine Art paper
signed: LRC in pencil: R Weingarten | LLC on back in pencil: PALETTE SERIES: ROBERT KUSHNER #1, (FLOOR), 2005
title: Palette Series: Robert Kushner #1, (Floor)
